snippet: Ginobili's injury will hurt the Spurs, but Coach Gregg Popovich is always resourceful -- and T.J. Ford will be an important component of his strategy.
abstract: Ginobili's injury will hurt the Spurs, but Coach Gregg Popovich is always resourceful -- and T.J. Ford will be an important component of his strategy.
lead_paragraph: San Antonio's Manu Ginobili will miss six weeks of action as he recovers from surgery on his left hand, but so far the Spurs have been just fine without him. That won't last; although San Antonio has pulled off a comeback win and a dominant blowout victory over the last two days, this team is unquestionably lesser without Ginobili in the lineup.

headline.main: How the Spurs Can Survive Without Ginobili
